body.name: Peg Perego Viaggio Hbb 120 - Booster Car Seat - for Children from 40 to 120 Lbs - Made in Italy - Monza (Black & Red)
body.stockDetail: Only 15 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 6 hrs 3 mins
features: Adjustable Side Impact Protection exceeds the most stringent tests in the world; Wide-padded wings provide Side Impact Protection at head and shoulder level; EPS foam in head panel protects the child's head from impact forces. Made In Italy.
Includes latch connectors that attach to vehicle, keeping the booster seat secure when not in use. Uses forward facing with a maximum height of 57 inches.
The backrest on the Viaggio HBB 120 can be removed for easier travel and transport; (Please Note: The backrest provides the best protection for your child's head and shoulders in a side collision)

Head panel adjusts easily in 6 vertical positions, even while child is in the seat. Head panel adjusts easily in 6 vertical positions, even while child is in the seat. Attach the connectors to the vehicle’s lower anchors.

Innovative microfiber fabric on seat is breathable and absorbs moisture - keeping the child cool and comfortable; The plush padding of the booster seat keeps child comfortable and secure; The booster seat comes with a pull-out cup holder on each side.
body.description: Keep your growing child safe with the Viaggio HBB 120. The newest addition to the Viaggio family, the HBB 120 can comfortably seat a child from 40 to 120 pounds. Equipped with back support and total Side Impact Protection to ensure a safer ride. The Viaggio HBB 120 is equipped with total Side Impact Protection (SIP), keeping your child safe in the event of an accident. Expanded Poly Styrene (EPS) can be found in the headrest and seat cushion, providing increased protection and comfort. LATCH connectors have been added to the Viaggio HBB 120 for additional stability and to keep the booster seat in place when not in use. The Viaggio HBB 120 features a six position head panel that can be adjusted even while child is in the seat. This allows for the best possible fit for a growing child. An easy access recline handle found at the front of the booster seat gives the ability to adjust the seat bottom and recline the Viaggio HBB on long journeys. With the Viaggio HBB 120, parents will find a booster seat that adds to the look of their vehicle. Elegant, two-toned fabrics come together through detailed stitching and tailoring, bringing both comfort and safety to the child. The Viaggio HBB 120 provides the look and feel of a high-class automotive seat. Child restraint can be installed with the vehicle's safety belts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Growing son loves his Peg Perego booster! Mom happy with side impact protection and Euro slim style.
reviews.reviewText: My son outgrew his carseat and we thought we would stick to the same brand but discovered it didn't provide side-impact protection. This Peg Perego model DOES! And it is Italian made and shows it! Clips on securely with seat belt guides to make buckling up a cinch, even for the little one who is wanting to be more independent and responsible. Great features are height adjustment, recline (slight but effective) and that you can adjust without uninstalling the booster.I use it with the back for now but it can also be used without the back as my son grows up. Cup holders on each side are ok, not as deep as I'd like but they do hold an insulated water bottle just fine. Our middle seat in the rear does interfere with the cup holder so it was very thoughtful design that the manufacturers put a cup holder on both sides. It tucks neatly into the seat when not in use and is very easy to clean.For it's style, quality of materials, durable construction, variety and ease of adjustments, comfortable ride, and of course, the side-impact protection provided, I am incredibly pleased with our Peg Perego booster. So thrilled!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 15, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Peg User for life!!
reviews.reviewText: I have only ever used “Peg” products for all my children. Zero regrets. This car seat is chic and easy to install. Works perfectly. The back feels a little flimsy based on the other reviews but you need to remember this isn’t a rigid car seat it’s a booster seat for graduating children from a harness setup. It’s the first seat with a latch system which makes me feel ten times more secure! My child loves it and the cup holders are a bonus he likes and has helped him become more independent. Thank you Peg for quality, stylish and reliable products for the last 19 years through each child! Highly highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 31, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and perfect for kids that fall asleep
reviews.reviewText: 💯 worth the extra money!! I needed a high back booster for my 7 year old but one that has plenty of padding and could keep her in the right position when she fell asleep. It has been super comfortable, easy to pop in, has a tilt option to fit into our seat better, the arm rests are nice and the pop out cup holders work well. She has fallen asleep on trips and it has never allowed her to slouch forward. I will for sure but this again when the time comes for our other kids.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 15, 2014
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars No 5 point harness
reviews.reviewText: Like most of the parents I did extended research on car seats before making my choice. I ordered from Amazon: Britax Frontier 90, Clek Oobr Booster Car Seat, Peg Perego Viaggio HBB 120, and Britax Parkway SGL Belt-Positioning Booster Seat. Out of the 4 I like the most Peg Perego. It would be the perfect booster if has a 5 point harness. Britax Frontier 90 has a 5 point harness and it seams well padded, but is way too bulky, very heavy, and the fabric is not as nice as the Peg Perego. Clek Oobr is probably the sturdiest, heavy, but has no 5 point harness. Britax Parkway SGL is flimsy and the fabric is cheap. I'll keep the Peg Perego for now, but I'm still researching for the best booster seat.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 23, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits fairly well in a Porsche Cayman 987
reviews.reviewText: I had been looking for a seat for my 5yo and took a chance on this one. I put some towels underneath the seat to protect the leather, and get it to orient properly/snugly to the seat. Totally fits the bill, fits nicely in the passenger seat, it's not really "attached" per se to anything when the seatbelt isn't buckled, it's just a frame basically for the stock seat belt to work. Had one moment where I had to slam on the brakes, hard, with the kid in the car and it worked flawlessly. I have not been in a crash so I can't speak to its crash-worthiness, and hope never to update this review. But for anyone who's trying to take their kid out for some fun in the Cayman, fits well, looks great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to install
reviews.reviewText: Comfortable and easy to install and use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 25, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Midweight, narrow & PINK!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been searching highback booster seats for a month. We bought two and returned them, just felt like I couldn’t find the right one. This seat had everything that we need!Pros:-It’s pink! Huge plus for my daughter, lol.-It’s comfortable.-It fits three across in the back of my dodge caravan, along with a Baby Jogger City View carseat.-It has latch system clips to keep it from sliding around.-It’s mid weight - heavy enough to feel sturdy and safe, but not so heavy it can’t be moved from car to car.Cons:-Cup holders do not have a bottom, however we keep it closed in order to fit three car seats. My daughter can also reach the van cup holder without a problem so it wasn’t a deal breaker for us.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I waited to write this review. We cannot be happier with this booster seat. Oh and our daughter loves it so much. Her booster seat is finally comfortable and its PINK! Thank you for making such a great booster seats. Comfortable, easy to install, safe and looks really cute in our SUV.
